blog_summaries.title: The 2026 Renters' Rights Act: A Survival Guide
key_points: Fixed-term tenancies convert to periodic on May 1st, 2026.
Landlords must give 4 months notice; tenants give 2 months.
Rental bidding is illegal; accepting offers above asking is a criminal offense.
S21 notices served before May 1st must initiate court action by July 31st, 2026.

blog_summaries.title: The 2030 EPC C Deadline Roadmap
key_points: October 1st, 2030 is the hard deadline for EPC C.
£10,000 cost cap per property (£10% of value if property < £100k).
Grants: £7,500 for heat pumps (BUS), up to £15,000 for insulation (Warm Homes).

blog_summaries.title: Manchester vs Liverpool 2026
key_points: Northern Powerhouse Rail (NPR) linking cities in 30 mins.
Liverpool: North Shore (£7.5bn) regeneration near new stadium.
Warrington identified as 'balanced play' between the two hubs.
